deployment.author: James Hassett
deployment.message:
🚀 Major update: Replace Office365 client with Microsoft Graph API
✨ Features: - Replaced Office365 REST Python client with Microsoft Graph API - Added GraphSharePointClient for reliable SharePoint operations - Added get_site_info tool for site information - Improved authentication using Azure Identity + Graph tokens
🔧 Improvements: - Removed legacy Office365 dependencies (office365-rest-python-client, aiohttp) - Simplified dependencies to core requirements - Better error handling and type safety - Faster performance with direct REST API calls
✅ Tested with Tasseh Capital SharePoint site: - All file operations working (read, write, delete, list) - Site info retrieval working - Connection testing working - Authentication via existing Azure app registration working
🧹 Cleanup: - Removed outdated sharepoint_client.py - Removed temporary test files - Updated documentation and examples - Updated dependencies in pyproject.toml and requirements.txt
